80 struct PlanningContextManager::CachedContexts
81 {

88 ompl_interface::MultiQueryPlannerAllocator::~MultiQueryPlannerAllocator()
89 {
90  // Store all planner data
91  for (const auto& entry : planner_data_storage_paths_)
92  {
93  ROS_INFO("Storing planner data");
94  ob::PlannerData data(planners_[entry.first]->getSpaceInformation());
95  planners_[entry.first]->getPlannerData(data);
96  storage_.store(data, entry.second.c_str());
97  }
98 }
99 
100 template <typename T>
101 ompl::base::PlannerPtr ompl_interface::MultiQueryPlannerAllocator::allocatePlanner(
102  const ob::SpaceInformationPtr& si, const std::string& new_name, const ModelBasedPlanningContextSpecification& spec)
103 {
104  // Store planner instance if multi-query planning is enabled
105  auto cfg = spec.config_;
106  auto it = cfg.find("multi_query_planning_enabled");
107  bool multi_query_planning_enabled = false;
108  if (it != cfg.end())
109  {
110  multi_query_planning_enabled = boost::lexical_cast<bool>(it->second);
111  cfg.erase(it);
112  }
113  if (multi_query_planning_enabled)
114  {
115  // If we already have an instance, use that one
116  auto planner_map_it = planners_.find(new_name);
117  if (planner_map_it != planners_.end())
118  return planner_map_it->second;
119 
120  // Certain multi-query planners allow loading and storing the generated planner data. This feature can be
121  // selectively enabled for loading and storing using the bool parameters 'load_planner_data' and
122  // 'store_planner_data'. The storage file path is set using the parameter 'planner_data_path'.
123  // File read and write access are handled by the PlannerDataStorage class. If the file path is invalid
124  // an error message is printed and the planner is constructed/destructed with default values.
125  it = cfg.find("load_planner_data");
126  bool load_planner_data = false;
127  if (it != cfg.end())
128  {
129  load_planner_data = boost::lexical_cast<bool>(it->second);
130  cfg.erase(it);
131  }
132  it = cfg.find("store_planner_data");
133  bool store_planner_data = false;
134  if (it != cfg.end())
135  {
136  store_planner_data = boost::lexical_cast<bool>(it->second);
137  cfg.erase(it);
138  }
139  it = cfg.find("planner_data_path");
140  std::string planner_data_path;
141  if (it != cfg.end())
142  {
143  planner_data_path = it->second;
144  cfg.erase(it);
145  }
146  // Store planner instance for multi-query use
147  planners_[new_name] =
148  allocatePlannerImpl<T>(si, new_name, spec, load_planner_data, store_planner_data, planner_data_path);
149  return planners_[new_name];
150  }
151  else
152  {
153  // Return single-shot planner instance
154  return allocatePlannerImpl<T>(si, new_name, spec);
155  }
156 }
157 
158 template <typename T>
159 ompl::base::PlannerPtr ompl_interface::MultiQueryPlannerAllocator::allocatePlannerImpl(
160  const ob::SpaceInformationPtr& si, const std::string& new_name, const ModelBasedPlanningContextSpecification& spec,
161  bool load_planner_data, bool store_planner_data, const std::string& file_path)
162 {
163  ob::PlannerPtr planner;
164  // Try to initialize planner with loaded planner data
165  if (load_planner_data)
166  {
167  ROS_INFO("Loading planner data");
168  ob::PlannerData data(si);
169  storage_.load(file_path.c_str(), data);
170  planner = std::shared_ptr<ob::Planner>{ allocatePersistentPlanner<T>(data) };
171  if (!planner)
172  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME,
173  "Creating a '%s' planner from persistent data is not supported. Going to create a new instance.",
174  new_name.c_str());
175  }
176  if (!planner)
177  planner = std::make_shared<T>(si);
178  if (!new_name.empty())
179  planner->setName(new_name);
180  planner->params().setParams(spec.config_, true);
181  // Remember which planner instances to store when the destructor is called
182  if (store_planner_data)
183  planner_data_storage_paths_[new_name] = file_path;
184  return planner;
185 }
186

188 template <typename T>
189 inline ompl::base::Planner*
190 ompl_interface::MultiQueryPlannerAllocator::allocatePersistentPlanner(const ob::PlannerData& /*data*/)
191 {
192  return nullptr;
193 };

226 ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::PlanningContextManager(moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr robot_model,
227  constraint_samplers::ConstraintSamplerManagerPtr csm)
228  : robot_model_(std::move(robot_model))
229  , constraint_sampler_manager_(std::move(csm))
230  , max_goal_samples_(10)
231  , max_state_sampling_attempts_(4)
232  , max_goal_sampling_attempts_(1000)
233  , max_planning_threads_(4)
234  , max_solution_segment_length_(0.0)
235  , minimum_waypoint_count_(2)
236 {
237  cached_contexts_ = std::make_shared<CachedContexts>();
238  registerDefaultPlanners();
239  registerDefaultStateSpaces();
240 }
241 
242 ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::~PlanningContextManager() = default;
243 
244 ompl_interface::ConfiguredPlannerAllocator
245 ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::plannerSelector(const std::string& planner) const
246 {
247  auto it = known_planners_.find(planner);
248  if (it != known_planners_.end())
249  return it->second;
250  else
251  {
252  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unknown planner: '%s'", planner.c_str());
253  return ConfiguredPlannerAllocator();
254  }
255 }
256 
257 template <typename T>
258 void ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::registerPlannerAllocatorHelper(const std::string& planner_id)
259 {
260  registerPlannerAllocator(planner_id, [&](const ob::SpaceInformationPtr& si, const std::string& new_name,
261  const ModelBasedPlanningContextSpecification& spec) {
262  return planner_allocator_.allocatePlanner<T>(si, new_name, spec);
263  });
264 }

272  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::BKPIECE1>("geometric::BKPIECE");
273  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::EST>("geometric::EST");
274  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::FMT>("geometric::FMT");
275  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::KPIECE1>("geometric::KPIECE");
276  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::LazyPRM>("geometric::LazyPRM");
277  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::LazyPRMstar>("geometric::LazyPRMstar");
278  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::LazyRRT>("geometric::LazyRRT");
279  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::LBKPIECE1>("geometric::LBKPIECE");
280  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::LBTRRT>("geometric::LBTRRT");
281  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::PDST>("geometric::PDST");
282  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::PRM>("geometric::PRM");
283  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::PRMstar>("geometric::PRMstar");
284  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::ProjEST>("geometric::ProjEST");
285  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::RRT>("geometric::RRT");
286  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::RRTConnect>("geometric::RRTConnect");
287  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::RRTstar>("geometric::RRTstar");
288  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::SBL>("geometric::SBL");
289  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::SPARS>("geometric::SPARS");

291  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::STRIDE>("geometric::STRIDE");
292  registerPlannerAllocatorHelper<og::TRRT>("geometric::TRRT");

295 void ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::registerDefaultStateSpaces()
296 {
297  registerStateSpaceFactory(ModelBasedStateSpaceFactoryPtr(new JointModelStateSpaceFactory()));
298  registerStateSpaceFactory(ModelBasedStateSpaceFactoryPtr(new PoseModelStateSpaceFactory()));

301 ompl_interface::ConfiguredPlannerSelector ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::getPlannerSelector() const
302 {
303  return std::bind(&PlanningContextManager::plannerSelector, this, std::placeholders::_1);

311 
312 ompl_interface::ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::getPlanningContext(
313  const planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationSettings& config,
314  const StateSpaceFactoryTypeSelector& factory_selector, const moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest& /*req*/) const
315 {
316  const ompl_interface::ModelBasedStateSpaceFactoryPtr& factory = factory_selector(config.group);
317 
318  // Check for a cached planning context
319  ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr context;
320 
321  {
322  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> slock(cached_contexts_->lock_);
323  auto cached_contexts = cached_contexts_->contexts_.find(std::make_pair(config.name, factory->getType()));
324  if (cached_contexts != cached_contexts_->contexts_.end())
325  {
326  for (const ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr& cached_context : cached_contexts->second)
327  if (cached_context.unique())
328  {
329  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Reusing cached planning context");
330  context = cached_context;
331  break;
332  }
333  }
334  }
335 
336  // Create a new planning context
337  if (!context)
338  {
339  ModelBasedStateSpaceSpecification space_spec(robot_model_, config.group);
340  ModelBasedPlanningContextSpecification context_spec;
341  context_spec.config_ = config.config;
342  context_spec.planner_selector_ = getPlannerSelector();
343  context_spec.constraint_sampler_manager_ = constraint_sampler_manager_;
344  context_spec.state_space_ = factory->getNewStateSpace(space_spec);
345 
346  // Choose the correct simple setup type to load
347  context_spec.ompl_simple_setup_ = std::make_shared<ompl::geometric::SimpleSetup>(context_spec.state_space_);
348 
349  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Creating new planning context");
350  context = std::make_shared<ModelBasedPlanningContext>(config.name, context_spec);
351  {
352  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> slock(cached_contexts_->lock_);
353  cached_contexts_->contexts_[std::make_pair(config.name, factory->getType())].push_back(context);
354  }
355  }
356 
357  context->setMaximumPlanningThreads(max_planning_threads_);
358  context->setMaximumGoalSamples(max_goal_samples_);
359  context->setMaximumStateSamplingAttempts(max_state_sampling_attempts_);
360  context->setMaximumGoalSamplingAttempts(max_goal_sampling_attempts_);
361  if (max_solution_segment_length_ > std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon())
362  context->setMaximumSolutionSegmentLength(max_solution_segment_length_);
363  context->setMinimumWaypointCount(minimum_waypoint_count_);
364 
365  context->setSpecificationConfig(config.config);
366 
367  return context;
368 }
369 
370 const ompl_interface::ModelBasedStateSpaceFactoryPtr&
371 ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::getStateSpaceFactory1(const std::string& /* dummy */,
372  const std::string& factory_type) const
373 {
374  auto f = factory_type.empty() ? state_space_factories_.begin() : state_space_factories_.find(factory_type);
375  if (f != state_space_factories_.end())
376  return f->second;
377  else
378  {
379  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Factory of type '%s' was not found", factory_type.c_str());
380  static const ModelBasedStateSpaceFactoryPtr EMPTY;
381  return EMPTY;
382  }
383 }
384 
385 const ompl_interface::ModelBasedStateSpaceFactoryPtr&
386 ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::getStateSpaceFactory2(const std::string& group,
387  const moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest& req) const
388 {
389  // find the problem representation to use
390  auto best = state_space_factories_.end();
391  int prev_priority = 0;
392  for (auto it = state_space_factories_.begin(); it != state_space_factories_.end(); ++it)
393  {
394  int priority = it->second->canRepresentProblem(group, req, robot_model_);
395  if (priority > prev_priority)
396  {
397  best = it;
398  prev_priority = priority;
399  }
400  }
401 
402  if (best == state_space_factories_.end())
403  {
404  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "There are no known state spaces that can represent the given planning "
405  "problem");
406  static const ModelBasedStateSpaceFactoryPtr EMPTY;
407  return EMPTY;
408  }
409  else
410  {
411  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Using '%s' parameterization for solving problem", best->first.c_str());
412  return best->second;
413  }
414 }
415 
416 ompl_interface::ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr ompl_interface::PlanningContextManager::getPlanningContext(
417  const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& planning_scene, const moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest& req,
418  moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes& error_code, const ros::NodeHandle& nh, bool use_constraints_approximation) const
419 {
420  if (req.group_name.empty())
421  {
422  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "No group specified to plan for");
423  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GROUP_NAME;
424  return ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr();
425  }
426 
427  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE;
428 
429  if (!planning_scene)
430  {
431  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "No planning scene supplied as input");
432  return ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr();
433  }
434 
435  // identify the correct planning configuration
436  auto pc = planner_configs_.end();
437  if (!req.planner_id.empty())
438  {
439  pc = planner_configs_.find(req.planner_id.find(req.group_name) == std::string::npos ?
440  req.group_name + "[" + req.planner_id + "]" :
441  req.planner_id);
442  if (pc == planner_configs_.end())
443  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME,
444  "Cannot find planning configuration for group '%s' using planner '%s'. Will use defaults instead.",
445  req.group_name.c_str(), req.planner_id.c_str());
446  }
447 
448  if (pc == planner_configs_.end())
449  {
450  pc = planner_configs_.find(req.group_name);
451  if (pc == planner_configs_.end())
452  {
453  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Cannot find planning configuration for group '%s'", req.group_name.c_str());
454  return ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr();
455  }
456  }
457 
458  // Check if sampling in JointModelStateSpace is enforced for this group by user.
459  // This is done by setting 'enforce_joint_model_state_space' to 'true' for the desired group in ompl_planning.yaml.
460  //
461  // Some planning problems like orientation path constraints are represented in PoseModelStateSpace and sampled via IK.
462  // However consecutive IK solutions are not checked for proximity at the moment and sometimes happen to be flipped,
463  // leading to invalid trajectories. This workaround lets the user prevent this problem by forcing rejection sampling
464  // in JointModelStateSpace.
465  StateSpaceFactoryTypeSelector factory_selector;
466  auto it = pc->second.config.find("enforce_joint_model_state_space");
467 
468  if (it != pc->second.config.end() && boost::lexical_cast<bool>(it->second))
469  factory_selector = std::bind(&PlanningContextManager::getStateSpaceFactory1, this, std::placeholders::_1,
470  JointModelStateSpace::PARAMETERIZATION_TYPE);
471  else
472  factory_selector = std::bind(&PlanningContextManager::getStateSpaceFactory2, this, std::placeholders::_1, req);
473 
474  ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr context = getPlanningContext(pc->second, factory_selector, req);
475 
476  if (context)
477  {
478  context->clear();
479 
480  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr start_state = planning_scene->getCurrentStateUpdated(req.start_state);
481 
482  // Setup the context
483  context->setPlanningScene(planning_scene);
484  context->setMotionPlanRequest(req);
485  context->setCompleteInitialState(*start_state);
486 
487  context->setPlanningVolume(req.workspace_parameters);
488  if (!context->setPathConstraints(req.path_constraints, &error_code))
489  return ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr();
490 
491  if (!context->setGoalConstraints(req.goal_constraints, req.path_constraints, &error_code))
492  return ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr();
493 
494  try
495  {
496  context->configure(nh, use_constraints_approximation);
497  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "%s: New planning context is set.", context->getName().c_str());
498  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
499  }
500  catch (ompl::Exception& ex)
501  {
502  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "OMPL encountered an error: %s", ex.what());
503  context.reset();
504  }
505  }
506 
507  return context;
508 }
